name: TimeRace
description:
This game has been made for TriJam#121. It is so very basic and will maybe evolve later.

Try to reach the wormhole !

You're controlling a space-craft. Try to reach the wormhole at the opposite side of the map. Be careful to your fuel level and take care of the planet's gravity !.

Controls :

Click to get an acceleration in the direction of the cursor

The game has been made under 4h45 (limitation was 3h). I take a lot of time to play-test the level and be sure that it is possible to win, and it is !
I didn't have enought time to continue (add level, add music and sound-effects, ...) so...
